name: Navsports
overview:
If you can measure it, you can manage it goes the saying.

Navsports (navigate sports) is leading the way, an Australian based company with offices in the United States have developed proprietary technology to gather and analyze vast amounts of geographical sporting data.

Navsports Linked Data Analytics is an online application that aggregates sports participation data, volunteer roles within sporting bodies, Secondary and Tertiary sporting interests and a host of highly sort after statistics that have previously been unable to be acquired.

â€œFor too long State and National sporting bodies have been kept in the dark, Navsports provides the tools to bring all sports to the next levelâ€.

â€œBetter State and Federal funding allocations can be made using Navsports Linked Data Analytics, Resources can be better directed to promote and grow sports participation. Thatâ€™s Navsports goalâ€ Founder and CEO Mr. Stewart Whicker said.

With over seven hundred thousand hits per month www.navsports.com United States and www.navsports.com.au Australia, Navsports Limited’s online sports directory and social networking sites are quickly becoming the hottest destination for sports club and social sports information online.

Navsports board boasts an Olympic Gold medalist a Computer engineer and a former Australian Judo champion.

On the software side of things internationally renowned Information technology specialist Marcelo Moraes heads up Navsports team of young and enthusiastic developers.

As Navsports moves into athlete sponsorships and sports news aggregation itâ€™s definitely a brand to keep your eye on in the near future.
